DOC.brief_summary: The standard procedure use airway control general anesthesia LC ( laparoscopic cholecystectomy ) endotracheal intubation ( EI ) . AuraGain I-Gel supraglottic airway device ( SADs ) use airway control certain type surgery . The aim study evaluate compare performance new type SADs EI regard insertion time , duration , perioperative complication effect hemodynamic parameter peak airway pressure ( Paw ) LC well .
DOC.brief_title: AuraGainTM I-Gel® Laryngeal Masks General Anesthesia Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The standard procedure use airway control general anesthesia LC ( laparoscopic cholecystectomy ) endotracheal intubation ( EI ) . AuraGain I-Gel supraglottic airway device ( SADs ) use airway control certain type surgeries.Previous study investigate and/or compare performance ProSeal™ LMA ( Intavent Orthofix , Maidenhead , UK ) LC . But performances I-Gel AuraGain study well yet . The main aim study evaluate compare performance new type SADs ( i.e . AuraGain I-Gel ) endotracheal intubation regard insertion time , ease insertion perioperative complication . The secondary aim observe effect hemodynamic parameter peak airway pressure .
DOC.criteria: ( ASA ) 12 physical status schedule elective LC age 18 , history hiatus hernia , gastroesophageal reflux , body mass index ( BMI ) > 30 kg m2 , ASA physical status 3 patient meet difficult intubation criterion
